allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add chat-based AI block editing in page editor

Add conversational block editing via a new "AI" tab in the page editor
sidebar. Users can select a block, describe changes in natural language,
and the AI updates the block content live using Claude''s tool_use pattern.

- Add chatEditBlockContent\(\) with update_block tool in ai-site-generator
- Add aiChatEditBlock\(\) server action with auth + site ownership checks
- Create BlockChat component with message bubbles, auto-scroll, per-block
  example prompts, loading state, and "Block updated" indicators
- Add AI tab to page editor with per-block chat history persistence

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
